mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = #{storNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CRM_CUST_BAS WHERE ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CRM_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'ST040' AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2 AND COMN_CD = #{chlNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT /*checkChitNoCheck*/ FROM CRM_STMP_HST WHERE CHIT_NO = #{chitNo}

SELECT /*getStmpCancelData*/ STMP_HST_SEQ , STMP_ACCUM_QNTY , COUPN_NO , POINT_SCORE , ISSUE_CNT FROM ( SELECT STMP_HST_SEQ , STMP_ACCUM_QNTY , NVL(COUPN_NO,0) AS COUPN_NO , NVL(POINT_SCORE,0) AS POINT_SCORE , ISSUE_CNT FROM CRM_STMP_HST WHERE MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO = #{mshipStmpBasNo} AND ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} ORDER BY ISSUE_CNT DESC, STMP_ACCUM_QNTY DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{cancelCnt}

/* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmMshipStmpBasDao.getMasterStmpByGodsList */ SELECT A.MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO , NVL(B.STMP_ACCUM_QNTY,0) AVAILABLE_CNT , B.ITG_CUST_NO , (SELECT LISTAGG(DISTINCT GODS_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY GODS_NO) FROM CRM_MSHIP_APPLY_GODS_REL REL WHERE MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO = A.MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO AND GODS_NO IN ('XXXXX' , #{item.buyGodsNo} ) ) GODS_NO FROM CRM_MSHIP_STMP_BAS A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ITG_CUST_NO , MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO ORDER BY STMP_HST_SEQ DESC) RNUM FROM CRM_STMP_HST A WHERE ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} ) A WHERE RNUM = 1 ) B ON A.MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO = B.MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO AND A.STMP_QNTY > B.STMP_ACCUM_QNTY WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN A.FROM_USE_POSS_DT AND A.TO_USE_POSS_DT AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO IN ( SELECT MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO FROM CRM_MSHIP_APPLY_GODS_REL WHERE GODS_NO IN ('XXXXX' , #{item.buyGodsNo} )) AND A.MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO IN ( SELECT MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO FROM CRM_MSHIP_APPLY_STOR_REL WHERE STOR_NO = #{storNo} AND MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO IS NOT NULL )

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ITG_CUST_NO ORDER BY STMP_HST_SEQ DESC) RNUM FROM CRM_STMP_HST A WHERE ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} AND MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO = #{mshipStmpBasNo} ) A WHERE #{cancelCnt} >= RNUM
mapper.delete: /* com.ceragem.api.crm.dao.CrmMshipStmpBasDao.deleteStmpCancel */ DELETE FROM CRM_STMP_HST WHERE STMP_HST_SEQ IN ( SELECT STMP_HST_SEQ FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ITG_CUST_NO ORDER BY STMP_HST_SEQ DESC) RNUM FROM CRM_STMP_HST A WHERE ITG_CUST_NO = #{itgCustNo} AND MSHIP_STMP_BAS_NO = #{mshipStmpBasNo} ) WHERE #{cancelCnt} >= RNUM )
